actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to extend coverage, under the insurance system established by title II of the Social Security Act, to service performed by an individual as a Member of Congress.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to include Members of Congress, and the Vice President under the Federal Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance system.

titles.title: A bill to extend coverage, under the insurance system established by title II of the Social Security Act, to service performed by an individual as a Member of Congress.
